page.title: 03LIFE OF A LICHFIELD CHILD
page.content: "On a Tuesday I get up at about 8 O' clock.I go downstairs and join all my family for breakfast.We normally have cereal,toast and orange juice.After breakfast we get ready for school.My father and brother leave at 8:30,I leave at 8:45.At school I join my friends in the playground and we usually talk until 8:55,when the whistle goes.We go into school and lessons begin.We have lessons like Maths,Geography,History,English,P.E. or Swimming.Morning school ends at 12:15 when we have lunch.Some children have a school dinner,some stay at school but eat their own sandwiches,some go home for lunch.Afternoon school begins at 13:25 and ends at 15:45.When I get home I have a drink and watch T.V. then we have tea.After tea on Tuesday I get ready for Guides,where we work for badges.When I get home I go to bed."
